item.title: Create folder structures
item.description: Automate folder creation on Windows How to automate folder creation and folders structure creation on windows: @ECHO OFF REM Create folders for a new interface REM Parameters: GCC HRIS ITFT set basefolder=f:\interfaces set folders=(in out reports staging archive) set argC=0 for %%x in (%*) do Set /A argC+=1 :parametercheck if -%argC%- lss 3 ( goto :wrongcall ) echo Creating folder interfaces: :folderloop for %%i in %folders% do ( echo mkdir %basefolder%\%1\%2\%3\%%i mkdir %basefolder%\%1\%2\%3\%%i ) goto :end REM echo f:\interfaces\%1\%2\%3\in REM mkdir f:\interfaces\%1\%2\%3\in REM mkdir :wrongcall echo Wrong call.
